title: Why Choose Pavithra Stories?
intro: We don’t just take photographs — we craft experiences, tell stories, and preserve emotions that last a lifetime. Here’s why couples across Bengaluru trust us with their most important moments:

points.title: Story-First Photography
points.text: Every wedding is a story, not a photoshoot. We focus on genuine emotions, real moments, and natural interactions.

points.title: Cultural Sensitivity
points.text: From traditional rituals to modern celebrations, we respect and understand every culture and ceremony.

points.title: Cinematic Films
points.text: Our wedding films are crafted like cinema — emotional, immersive, and timeless.

points.title: Calm & Professional Team
points.text: We blend seamlessly into your celebration, allowing you to be yourself while we capture magic.
